IRS990.Desc: Masonicare at Newtown,Inc. is a skilled nursing and assisted living community. The skilled nursing facility has 154 beds and operated at a 77.1% occupancy rate providing 43,311 patient days. The assisted living facility, Lockwood Lodge, has 56 units and operated at an 87.5% occupancy rate. Average Lockwood Lodge occupancy was 49.0 units.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 6: Explanation of Classes of Members or Shareholder
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The organization has a sole corporate member,Masonicare Corporation, with the right to appoint the members of the governing body and to participate in the organization's governance.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 7a: How Members or Shareholders Elect Governing Body
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Masonicare Corporation, as a sole corporate member, annually appoints the members of the governing body.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 7b: Describe Decisions of Governing Body Approval by Members or Shareholders
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Persuant to the certificate of incorporation of the organization, Masonicare Corporation, as sole corporate member, has certain reserved powers to make or approve certain actions of the governing body. These powers include the prior approval of amendments to the organization's certificate of incorporation and bylaws, approval of long range plans, budgets and material changes in budgets, mission statements and policies (including investment policies) as well as sales or transfer of assets, mergers and/or dissolutions and certificate of need applications. The sole corporate member's powers also include the appointment and removal of directors, the company's board chairman and independent audit firm.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 11b: Form 990 Review Process
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Masonicare management reviews the tax return for completeness and accuracy. It is reviewed by the chief executive officer and chairman of the board. The tax return is also placed on a secured website that can be accessed by all board members for their review. At a full board meeting a discussion is held regarding comments/questions from board members. The tax return is than finalized and filed.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 12c: Explanation of Monitoring and Enforcement of Conflicts
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The results of the officer and director disclosures are first reviewed by the board chairman and then reported at the board meetings. Any officer or board member shall not make or second motions or vote (other than abstain) on matters if a conflict of interest exists, whether or not the officer or board member had an opportunity to make a written disclosure through the formalized process. Senior employee disclosures are reported to the president and chief executive officer and chief operating officer. The entire process is coordinated by the corporate compliance officer. All respondents are advised of their continuing duty to disclose any possible conflict of interest that may arise during the course of their service.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 19: Other Organization Documents Publicly Available
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The Masonicare Corporation financial statements are publicly avaliable through EMMAand public securities markets. The financial statements of Masonicare at Newtown are included in the Masonicare Corporation consolidated financial statements. The certificate of incorporation and related documents are on file with the Connecticut Secretary of State's office. The conflict of interest policy is avaliable upon request.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Other Changes In Net Assets Or Fund Balances - Other Increases

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: In concert with Masonicare, Inc and the name of Masonry, Masonicare at Newtown is committed to excellence by providing the highest quality of care and services to enrich the lives of those we serve. Building upon our Masonicare values and service to others, Masonicare at Newtown shall be the provider of a continum of care and support health,wellness and education among patients,residents and staff members and the community.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Li 15b-Compensation Review &Approval process-Key Em
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The compensation committe of Masonicare Corporation, engages an independent firm to certify the resonableness of the compensation of the executive management group of the organization annually. This process was completed in November 2014.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VII, SECTION A, LINE 1a-TRUSTEES
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Hours related for volunteer trustees (column B) are the estimated hours per week that the volunteer trustees contribute to this and all other related exempt organizations, not necessarily equally but in the proportion required for which they receive no compensation. Related organizations include Masonicare, Inc., Masonic Charity Foundation of CT., Masonicare Health Center, Masonicare at Home, Inc., Masonicare Home Health and Hospice, Inc., Masonicare Partners Home Health and Hospice Inc, Masonicare at Mystic, Inc., Masonicare at Ashlar Village, Inc. and Keystone Indemnity Company LTD.

Masonicare at Newtown, Inc is a member of the Masonicare obligated group that is responsible for the repayment of the series C and series E bonds issued by Masonicare, Inc in 2007 and 2011. The current outstanding balance is $98,869,224.

DisregardedEntityName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: Masonicare Home Health and Hospice Inc

IdRelatedTaxExemptOrgGrp.PrimaryActivitiesTxt: Provide home health services to clients of all ages

OtherOrganizationName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: Masonicare Home Health and Hospice Inc
Masonicare Home Health and Hospice Inc
